[Main Updates]

[b]◈In-Game Updates◈[/b]

1. Sabuk Clash Update
- Prepare for an epic region-based war to claim the throne of the Sabuk Emperor and prove your clan's might in this ultimate battle for power and glory!
2. Rule the Territory
- Rule your territory with unrivaled power as Emperor of the Sabuk Castle!
3. Party Leader Spirit: Red Eyes Lucy
- Check out MIR4’s newest Legendary Spirit which grants an additional buff for the party when summoned by the Party Leader.
4. Special Sabuk Clash Events!
- Come celebrate the release of Sabuk Clash and earn a bounty of rewards by participating in our exciting range of events!
5. Legendary Magic Stone Challenge Event
- Back by popular demand, the Legendary Magic Stone Challenge Event is here to offer you another chance to summon an elusive Legendary Magic Stone!

※ Maintenance schedule may change depending on the circumstances without prior notice.
※ We will open the servers in order.  

We will do our best to provide stable service. 

Thank you.
